noticeList.title_KR: 反饋/上報問題/巴哈姆特
noticeList.content_KR: {"list":[{"formatKey":"SubTitle","formatValue":"<size=49>上報問題提供遊戲目錄裡面的 '游戏日志.log',不提供將大概率不協助</size>"},{"formatKey":"HyperLink","formatValue":"<link=https://github.com/SmallYuanSY/LocalizeLimbusCompany_TW/issues>LocalizeLimbusCompany/Issues</link>"},{"formatKey":"Text","formatValue":"這些日誌文件每次關閉遊戲都會刷新，請確保正確與有效喔"},{"formatKey":"SubTitle","formatValue":"<size=49>巴哈姆特</size>"},{"formatKey":"HyperLink","formatValue":"https://forum.gamer.com.tw/C.php?bsn=73052&snA=297&tnum=10"},{"formatKey":"Image","formatValue":"Readme_LocalizeLimbusCompany_Group"}]}
